projects.title: DNPSIMS (Digital National Poverty Social Investment Management System)
projects.description: A comprehensive digital poverty management system that helps identify and support Nigeria's most vulnerable populations. The system features AI-powered algorithms for identifying and evaluating the poorest households using financial and personal data from BVN and NINC systems. The platform includes six admin dashboards, two user-facing dashboards and robust backend services capable of processing millions of requests. Implemented distributed event handling with Redis and queue management with RabbitMQ for optimal performance and scalability.

projects.title: Ivie AI
projects.description: An AI-powered Telegram bot that generates monthly revenue of about $1500. Features include conversational AI using GPT models, custom image generation via stable diffusion and voice conversation capabilities. Includes a custom credit system integrated with Paystack for subscription management.

projects.title: Rhema Nigeria: Bible School Management Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive platform for managing bible school operations, featuring real-time notifications, role-based access control and optimized performance. The system includes automated API documentation and robust monitoring capabilities, resulting in 50% increased stability and 40% faster response times.

image.alt: rhema nigeria bible school management platform interface

projects.title: Noteway
projects.description: Noteway is a collaborative note-taking/article-writing web app, i like to think of it as "a mesh of Google Keep & Google Docs" with a nice UI of course. individuals or teams can sync, organize & retrieve notes or tasks across multiple devices, share ideas & lots more. (in development).

projects.title: Records: Golang CSV Data Marshaler
projects.description: A light weight & blazingly fastüòÅ Go package that uses reflection under the hood to marshal & un-marshal CSV records(slice of slice of strings) to/from CSV entries(slice of struct).

projects.title: Aora
projects.description: A b2c e-commerce web app for sneakers, clothing accessories & more. built with basic functionalities like tracking/syncing user cart on multiple devices, get personalized recommendation on products e.t.c.
